price: A Mi smo htjeli da one koji su na Zemlji tlačeni milošću obaspemo i da ih vođama i nasljednicima učinimo,
arabic: وَنُرِيدُ أَن نَّمُنَّ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wanurīdu an namunna ʿalā alladhīna us'tuḍ'ʿifū fī al-arḍi wanajʿalahum a-immatan wanajʿalahumu al-wārithīna
